Italian sub salad

Italian sub salad

serves 2

ingredients

  • 4 leaves romaine
  • 8 slices ham
  • 8 slices salami
  • 1/2 cucumber
  • 1/2 tomato
  • 2 white onions
  • 1/2 C bell pepper
  • salt & pepper
  • dried basil
  • 2 tbs EVOO
  • 1/4 C red wine vinegar
